Magical Enhancements

Flamebrand

Rank Cost Effect
1 Weapon inflicts light fire damage on turn start. Recharge 33%, can cause 50% bonus fire damage plus medium ots.
2 Recharge effect bursts in a 2 square radius.
3 OTS is medium, and recharge effect is 100% base damage.
